UserAssignedIdentityMap__deleted.description: Map of user assigned managed identities.

reason.description: The reason for the capability not being available.

ObjectRecommendationPropertiesAnalyzedWo.description: Workload information for the recommended action.

startTime.description: Start time (UTC) of the workload analyzed.

endTime.description: End time (UTC) of the workload analyzed.

queryCount.description: Number of queries from the workload that were examined to produce this recommendation. For DROP INDEX recommendations it's 0 (zero).

ObjectRecommendationPropertiesImplementa.description: Implementation details for the recommended action.

method.description: Method of implementation for recommended action.

script.description: Implementation script for the recommended action.

items.description__deleted: SAS URI of Azure Storage Account Container.

description.__old: Status of key used by a server configured with data encryption based on customer managed key, to encrypt the geographically redundant storage associated to the server when it is configured to support geographically redundant backups.
description.__new: Status of key used by a server configured with data encryption based on customer managed key, to encrypt the primary storage associated to the server.

description.__old: High availability mode for a server.
description.__new: Modes of high availability supported for this compute.

description.__old: Indicates if public network access is enabled or not. This is only supported for servers that are not integrated into a virtual network which is owned and provided by customer when server is deployed.
description.__new: Indicates if public network access is enabled or not.

method.description: Method of implementation for recommended action.

script.description: Implementation script for the recommended action.

startTime.description: Start time (UTC) of the workload analyzed.

endTime.description: End time (UTC) of the workload analyzed.

queryCount.description: Number of queries from the workload that were examined to produce this recommendation. For DROP INDEX recommendations it's 0 (zero).

properties.description: Properties of the pair of virtual endpoints.

items.description__deleted: Server that one of the virtual endpoints can refer to.
